name: Egmont Aviation
about: Egmont Aviation Flight School, based in Slovenia, offers a comprehensive range of training programs from Private Pilot License (PPL) to Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL) EASA, catering to both beginners and experienced pilots. Our training adheres to European standards and is confirmed by EASA licenses upon completion. Operating from Maribor International Airport, we benefit from ideal weather conditions and low airport taxes, making training accessible and affordable. With affordable accommodation and meal options, and Slovenia ranking as one of the safest EU countries, we provide a secure and cost-effective environment for pilot training. We also offer conversion programs and partner with flight schools and aeroclubs for joint training initiatives. Choose Egmont Aviation for a rigorous and supportive flight training experience.
